items.title: Jihadists 'summarily executed' 127 people in Niger, says rights group
items.description: Worshippers have been gunned down in mosques and homes have been torched in escalating violence, Human Rights Watch says.

items.title: Chinese nationals jailed for human trafficking in South Africa
items.description: A raid on a Johannesburg factory found 91 Malawians, including 37 children, living in appalling conditions.

items.title: Protests hit France as new PM takes office
items.description: A grassroots movement is encouraging people to protest against the political class and proposed budget cuts.

items.title: Poland says it shot down Russian drones after airspace violation
items.description: Nato jets were also deployed to respond to drones that entered Polish airspace during Russian strikes on Ukraine.

items.title: Shock as Kenyan lawyer killed in drive-by shooting in Nairobi
items.description: Kyalo Mbobu was driving home when a gunman on a motorbike shot him dead on a busy street in the capital.
